tool_description: Evaluates allergen risks in menu items and kitchen preparation, providing safety protocols and risk mitigation strategies.

menu_items.description: List of all menu items with ingredients

known_guest_allergies.description: List of confirmed guest allergies and sensitivities

preparation_timeline.description: When food prep occurs relative to service (same-day, day-before, week-before)

staff_training_level.description: Kitchen staff allergy training level (basic, intermediate, advanced)

error_messages: Empty menu items: Provide at least one menu item for allergen assessment.
Unknown allergen type: One or more listed allergies are not recognized in the database.
Invalid kitchen setup: Use shared, dedicated-prep-areas, separate-kitchen, or home-kitchen.
Invalid preparation timeline: Use same-day, day-before, or week-before.
Invalid staff training level: Choose from basic, intermediate, or advanced.
Menu item limit exceeded: Maximum 100 menu items can be assessed simultaneously.
usage: Provide menu_items array, known_guest_allergies, kitchen_setup, and preparation_timeline. Optionally specify staff_training_level. Returns comprehensive allergen risk analysis and safety protocols.

risk_level.description: Overall allergen risk assessment (low, moderate, high, critical)

high_risk_items.description: Menu items posing highest allergen risks

required_protocols.description: Mandatory safety protocols for allergen management

safe_alternatives.description: Recommended safe menu alternatives for high-risk items

emergency_procedures.description: Emergency response procedures for allergic reactions
